mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_info (user_id, user_name, password, real_name, telephone, email, user_type, active, enable, create_by, create_time, last_login, user_logo) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{active,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userLogo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, real_name, telephone, email, user_type, active, enable, create_by, create_time, last_login, user_logo from sys_user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
